mlcf.windowing.iterator.iterator module

class mlcf.windowing.iterator.iterator.WindowIterator

Bases: abc.ABC

WindowIterator is an abstract class. Every class which attempt to iterate over a dataframe with window should be inherit from this WindowIterator.

__window_index

the window index used to iterate over the window.

Type

int

abstract property width: int
abstract write(dirpath: pathlib.Path, filename: str) → pathlib.Path
